benchmark_details.name: WILDVISION -BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: WILDVISION -BENCH is a challenging and natural benchmark for evaluating vision-language models (VLMs) that reflects real-world human use cases, closely aligned with user preferences collected from WILDVISION -ARENA.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate vision-language models in accordance with real-world human preferences and provide a benchmark that reflects actual usage scenarios.

methodology.calculation: Statistical analysis correlating model scores with user preferences.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with human preferences.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4o outperforms other models with high Elo ratings.
methodology.validation: User feedback and pairwise voting results.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: User data is logged for research purposes with appropriate consent.
